title: How to Create an Account
steps: Go to the homepage and click on the 'Sign Up' button.
Enter your name, email address,photoURL and choose a secure password.
Click 'Create Account' and verify your email to activate.

title: How to Log In
steps: Click the 'Login' button on the homepage.
Enter your registered email and password.
Click 'Log In' to access your dashboard.
If you forgot your password, use the 'Forgot Password' link.

title: How to Complete Your Profile
steps: Go to your profile by clicking on your avatar or name.
Fill in personal details, skills, experience, and education.
Upload your resume and profile photo.
Click 'Save' to update your profile information.

title: How to Search and Apply for Jobs
steps: Navigate to the 'Find Jobs' page.
Use the filters to search by title, location, or company.
Click on a job to view the full description.
Click 'Apply Now' and confirm your application.

title: How to Post a Job (For Recruiters)
steps: Log in as a recruiter and go to the 'Post Job' page.
Enter job title, description, skills, location, and salary.
Submit the job post; it will be pending admin approval.
Once approved by admin, it will be visible to job seekers.

title: How to Track Your Applications
steps: Go to the 'My Applications' section from the dashboard.
View the list of jobs you have applied to.
Track each applicationâ€™s status: Applied, Under Review, Selected, or Rejected.
You will be notified if a recruiter responds or selects you.
